DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and tolerability of multiple once daily ascending doses of AZD3199 in healthy men
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Doses (MAD) of AZD3199 Given Once Daily as Inhaled Formulation Via Turbuhaler to Healthy Men
DOC.criteria: BMI 1930, weight 60100 kg Non/exsmokers, Non/exnicotine users Any clinically significant disease or disorder Any clinically relevant abnormal findings at screening examinations Use of any prescribed or nonprescribed medication
